name: Ginger Software
overview: Ginger utilizes cutting-edge natural language understanding algorithms to help both native speakers and English as a Second Language users express themselves better using contextual grammar and spelling corrections. Ginger supports MS Office and all browsers, and is now available for mobile.Founded in 2008, Ginger has offices in the US and Israel and is backed by Mr. Zohar Gilon,  Horizons Ventures, the venture capital fund owned by Mr. Li Ka-shing, and Harbor Pacific Capital, a Silicon Valley-based venture firm.
